EmailTemplate.subject: The NCS Sleepout 2K16
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Calling all NCS graduates, we're the South Birmingham Youth Board.
Join us on Friday the 4th of March 2016 for The NCS SLEEPOUT 2K16
We want to reunite you with your NCS friends and to help the homeless in Birmingham by participating in an amazing experience.
Where: Kinmos Centre, 1 Kings Heath High Street, B14 7SP When: 7pm Friday 4th March to 7am Saturday 5th March.
To sign up please follow this link - https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/ncs-sleepout-2k16-tickets-21714698247
There are a limited number of tickets available and the sign up deadline is 12PM on Wednesday 24th February.
Once you have signed up on eventbrite, you and your parents will be sent a consent form. The deadline for consent forms to be returned back to us is Sunday 28th February.
Only NCS Graduates that have signed up and whose parents have consented are permitted to attend the SLEEPOUT.
Thank you and we hope to see you there!
The South Birmingham Youth Board
